name: Otaku's Fantasy
description: A new world had opened the door for me. All kinds of women threw themselves at me, and for all kinds of strange reasons. No matter it is a mixed-race lady with huge buttocks, a well-known news anchor secretly wants to be whipped, or a hungry cugar that almost eats me up, they all wants to know what it's like to be with me.
minimum_requirements: 最低配置: 操作系统: WIN7 SP1/WIN8/WIN10/XP 处理器: 1.2 GHz 内存: 1 GB RAM 图形: DirectX 9 compatible graphics card 存储空间: 需要 1 GB 可用空间
